entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
